prompt_base: raw photo, (unretouched:1.2) portrait of a seasoned middle-aged Japanese man, (stern battle-hardened martial arts master:1.1), weathered facial features, wise but fierce gaze, highly detailed skin anatomy, organic texture
feature_prompt: extreme skin detail, deep skin pores and wrinkles, realistic hair follicles, cinematic lighting, fujifilm xt4, film grain, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, barbie, smooth skin, airbrushed, lowres, blurry, distorted features, young skin
